name: "azure-verified-modules"
description: "Guidance to prefer Azure Verified Modules for common patterns and document deviations."
applyTo: "**/*.bicep,**/*.json"
---

# Azure Verified Modules

When possible prefer Azure Verified Modules for common infrastructure patterns. Document deviations and reasons when implementing custom modules.
# Azure Verified Modules

When possible prefer Azure Verified Modules for common infrastructure patterns. Document deviations and reasons when implementing custom modules.
